name: Slime.io (itch)
description:
The Windows and Mac downloadable Versions of Slime.io

W, A, S, D, controls

L-Shift or Space is to slide, which is faster than bouncing

Energy depletes over time, and you die at 0 energy

Trudging through slime puddles will drain energy faster

The first two versions are the versions done before the end of the game jam, the final versions have many balancing and QOL updates as well as some bugfixes
